name: Chettinad 43 Grade
description: Chettinad 43 Grade cement offers reliable strength for house construction, RCC works, and plastering. Made from high-quality Ordinary Portland Cement, it achieves a compressive strength of 43 MPa in 28 days. Ideal for building brick walls and flooring, this cement ensures durability and consistent performance for residential projects.

name: Chettinad Maxcrete
description: Chettinad Maxcrete is a high-performance PPC cement, perfect for bridges, roads, and heavy structures. Its Portland Pozzolana blend ensures superior strength, low heat of hydration, and resistance to sulphate attack. This cement provides excellent workability and durability, making it ideal for demanding construction projects.

name: Chettinad CEMENT 50 kg
description: Chettinad CEMENT 50 kg is a versatile OPC cement for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. It offers consistent quality and strength, making it suitable for a wide range of applications, from foundations to slabs. This cement ensures reliable performance and durability in diverse construction needs.

name: Chettinad Classic
description: Chettinad Classic, a Portland Slag Cement, is ideal for marine structures and mass concrete works. It offers excellent resistance to sulphate and chloride attacks, ensuring long-term durability in harsh environments. With low heat of hydration, this cement minimizes cracks, making it perfect for large-scale projects.

name: Chettinad 53 Grade
description: Chettinad 53 Grade OPC cement delivers high strength for bridges, high-rise buildings, and heavy concrete structures. Achieving 53 MPa in 28 days, it ensures early strength development for faster construction. This cement is perfect for projects requiring superior durability and performance under demanding conditions.

name: Chettinad Super Grade
description: Chettinad Super Grade PPC cement is perfect for plastering, flooring, and brick walls. Its Portland Pozzolana blend reduces the heat of hydration, minimizing cracks while providing excellent workability. This cement ensures a smooth finish and long-lasting strength, ideal for non-structural concrete applications.

name: COROMANDEL 43 Grade
description: COROMANDEL 43 Grade OPC cement offers reliable strength for residential construction and RCC works. With a compressive strength of 43 MPa in 28 days, it ensures durability for slabs, columns, and foundations. This cement is ideal for general construction, providing consistent quality and performance.

name: COROMANDEL 53 Grade
description: COROMANDEL 53 Grade OPC cement is designed for high-rise buildings, bridges, and dams. Achieving 53 MPa in 28 days, it provides high early strength for faster construction. Its superior resistance to aggressive environments like chemical and sulphate attacks ensures long-lasting durability in demanding projects.

name: COROMANDEL Super Power
description: COROMANDEL Super Power PPC cement is ideal for marine structures and coastal areas. Its Portland Pozzolana blend offers excellent resistance to corrosion, sulphate, and chloride attacks. With high durability and low heat of hydration, this cement ensures long-lasting performance in harsh environments.

name: Penna Cement 43 Grade
description: Penna Cement 43 Grade OPC provides reliable strength for residential buildings and RCC structures. With a compressive strength of 43 MPa in 28 days, it ensures durability for foundations, slabs, and columns. This cement offers consistent quality, making it a trusted choice for general construction.

name: Penna Cement 53 Grade
description: Penna Cement 53 Grade OPC is perfect for high-strength concrete and pre-cast items like paving blocks and tiles. Achieving 53 MPa in 28 days, it ensures early strength for speedy construction. Its balanced composition provides durability, making it ideal for bridges, runways, and high-rise buildings.

name: Penna Cement Super Power
suitablefor: Mass Concrete Works, Dams, Marine Structures
description: Penna Cement Super Power PPC is designed for mass concrete works, dams, and marine structures. Its Portland Pozzolana blend ensures low heat of hydration and high sulphate resistance, preventing cracks in large projects. This cement offers excellent durability and workability for challenging environments.

name: Construction and Building Range
description: High-quality electrical cables designed for construction and building applications, ensuring safe and reliable power distribution in residential and commercial spaces.

name: Single Core
description: Single core cables made with copper conductors and flame-retardant PVC insulation, ideal for wiring in electrical panels and internal circuits.

name: Control Cables
description: Durable control cables for industrial automation systems, providing reliable signal transmission and power control in harsh environments.

name: Fire and Security Cables
material: Copper and Low Smoke Zero Halogen (LSZH) Material
description: Fire-resistant and low-smoke cables designed for fire alarms and security systems, ensuring safety and reliability during emergencies.

name: Silicon Cables
description: Silicon-insulated cables with copper conductors, suitable for high-temperature environments like industrial ovens and heavy machinery.

name: Sanitaryware
description: Electrical components for sanitaryware, such as sensor-based flush valves and faucets, designed for modern bathroom applications.

name: Wiring Devices
description: Wiring devices like switches and sockets, made with durable polycarbonate and copper, suitable for safe residential electrical installations.

name: Wiring Devices
description: Premium wiring devices including switches, sockets, and dimmers, designed for safe and stylish electrical setups in homes and offices.

name: Home Automation
description: Advanced home automation systems for controlling lighting, appliances, and security, perfect for modern smart homes.

name: Lighting Management Systems
description: Lighting management systems with sensors and controls, ideal for energy-efficient lighting in commercial buildings.

name: Cable Management Systems
description: Cable management systems to organize and protect electrical wiring, suitable for offices and industrial environments.

name: Fans
description: Energy-efficient ceiling and pedestal fans, designed for effective air circulation in homes and offices.

name: Lighting
description: LED lighting solutions for indoor and outdoor use, providing bright and energy-efficient illumination.

name: Home Appliances
description: Electrical home appliances like mixers and geysers, designed for convenience and efficiency in households.

name: Pumps
description: Electrical pumps for water supply systems, suitable for residential and agricultural use with high durability.
